1 bonus stat anvil.

You gain <font color = '#f30c1a'>Crest of Cinders</font> and <font color = '#1542ea'>Crest of Insight</font>.

You can no longer reroll.

Select a Gold Augment, if at least @PrismaticThreshold@ rerolls were consumed, empower this to select a Prismatic Augment instead.

Naafiri and her pack patrol the arena. If any packmate spots a champion, all packmates lunge at them, dealing physical damage to the first champion along their trajectory. After lunging, the pack reforms and begins patroling a new route.

Lunge damage is based on the target's max and current health, and subsequent packmates to hit the same target deal reduced damage.

Champions gain Camouflage after being out of combat for 1.5 seconds.

Camouflaged units cannot be seen unless an enemy champion is inside their detection radius.

Every 12 seconds Gwen dashes to the lowest health champion, heals them based on their missing health, and surrounds them in Hallowed Mist for 4 seconds. Hallowed Mist affects all champions; champions inside it cannot be targeted by champions outside of it.

If one team has only one champion remaining while the other has two, Gwen will shroud the champion on the losing team instead of the lowest health champion.

Jhin fires a shot at a random champion every 8 seconds. After each champion has been shot at once, he repeats.

Shots deal physical damage based on max and current health, are blockable by other champions, and every 4th shot deals bonus damage based on the target's missing health.

Lux sweeps a marking laser around the arena. If a champion touches the laser, Lux casts her Ultimate at them to deal heavy magic damage to any unit hit based on their max and current health.

Each time Lux casts, the sweeping laser speeds up and switches directions.
Every 7 seconds, Pyke dashes at the furthest champion from him to deal light <physicalDamage>physical damage</physicalDamage> to and <status>Stun</status> units in the way after a brief delay.

Whenever a champion is immobilized, Samira will dash to them and juggle them to deal light physical damage and briefly knock them up.

After juggling enemies 5 times, Samira casts her Ultimate, dealing heavy physical damage to all nearby units over two seconds.

After taking a hit, Sett walks towards the enemy of whoever hit him and begins to drain health. When he runs out of health, he casts Haymaker towards the enemies of whoever last hit him, then restores his health.

Caution: Haymaker will hit ALL units in its way. Deals heavy true damage in the center and physical damage otherwise.

Every 7 seconds, Shaco places a Jack-in-the-Box behind an enemy from a random team, alternating teams each time. Boxes are stealthed, but their silhouettes are revealed.

Jack-in-the-Box last until triggered or destroyed and will Fear and deal magic damage to nearby units when triggered.

Sylas has broken the chains granting you access to a powerful Ultimate spell.

Once cast, your spell will return to normal.

Thresh roams the map tossing his Lantern to the furthest champion, granting a nearby champion with the lowest Health a small Shield and allowing anyone to click it and take the Midnight Express to Thresh's location.

If a single champion is downed inside the Ring of Fire, Thresh will instead move to the downed player's location and throw his Lantern to their ally.

When a player is dead and their ally is outnumbered, Thresh will always throw his Lantern to the that ally.

The first unit that would die instead becomes Viego. Death is still inevitable, and they lose 15% health every second.

As Viego, you can attack, use abilities, and possess fallen enemies.

Glacial Augment
This unit has reduced Move Speed and deals reduced damage to enemy champions other than the one that slowed them.Source: @SourceName@

Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause @RayCount@ glacial rays to emanate from them towards you and other nearby champions, creating frozen zones for @SlowZoneDuration@ (+ the immobilizing effect's duration) seconds that slow enemies for @SlowZoneSlowBase@% (+@SlowZoneSlowHealShieldRatio@% per 100% Heal and Shield Power) (+@SlowZoneSlowAPRatio*100@% per 100 Ability Power) (+@SlowZoneSlowbADRatio*100@% per 100 bonus Attack Damage) and reduce their damage by @DmgReduction*100@% against your allies (not including yourself).
